title: PR 5436 relies on a commit outside of the visibility scope
body:
Hello! Looks like PR #5436 relies on a ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@2928d1d9903a5a9bc9b665b162c07f101211f398 which is not yet merged into ledgerwatch/erigon-lib repository. Note the banner "This commit does not belong to any branch on this repository, and may belong to a fork outside of the repository" on top of the page. Could you please address it? 

It generates the following messages while compiling a freshly cloned Erigon repo:

```
host-1 ~/work/erigon2 (git::tags/v2022.09.03): make all
Building erigon
go: downloading github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib v0.0.0-20220920040819-2928d1d9903a
../../common/debug/memstats.go:7:2: github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20220920040819-2928d1d9903a: invalid version: unknown revision 2928d1d9903a
../../turbo/snapshotsync/block_snapshots.go:19:2: github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20220920040819-2928d1d9903a: invalid version: unknown revision 2928d1d9903a
../utils/flags.go:34:2: github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20220920040819-2928d1d9903a: invalid version: unknown revision 2928d1d9903a
main.go:11:2: github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20220920040819-2928d1d9903a: invalid version: unknown revision 2928d1d9903a

../../core/state/rw22.go:15:2: github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20220920040819-2928d1d9903a: invalid version: unknown revision 2928d1d9903a
../../turbo/snapshotsync/block_snapshots.go:22:2: github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20220920040819-2928d1d9903a: invalid version: unknown revision 2928d1d9903a
../../eth/backend.go:35:2: github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20220920040819-2928d1d9903a: invalid version: unknown revision 2928d1d9903a
../../core/state/rw22.go:16:2: github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20220920040819-2928d1d9903a: invalid version: unknown revision 2928d1d9903a
../../turbo/shards/state_change_accumulator.go:7:2: github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20220920040819-2928d1d9903a: invalid version: unknown revision 2928d1d9903a
../../eth/stagedsync/stage_snapshots.go:15:2: github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20220920040819-2928d1d9903a: invalid version: unknown revision 2928d1d9903a

../../turbo/shards/state_change_accumulator.go:8:2: github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20220920040819-2928d1d9903a: invalid version: unknown revision 2928d1d9903a
../../eth/protocols/eth/protocol.go:27:2: github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20220920040819-2928d1d9903a: invalid version: unknown revision 2928d1d9903a
../../ethdb/privateapi/all.go:9:2: github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20220920040819-2928d1d9903a: invalid version: unknown revision 2928d1d9903a
../../eth/stagedsync/stage_finish.go:13:2: github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20220920040819-2928d1d9903a: invalid version: unknown revision 2928d1d9903a
../utils/flags.go:35:2: github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20220920040819-2928d1d9903a: invalid version: unknown revision 2928d1d9903a

../../node/node.go:37:2: github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20220920040819-2928d1d9903a: invalid version: unknown revision 2928d1d9903a
../rpcdaemon/cli/config.go:29:2: github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20220920040819-2928d1d9903a: invalid version: unknown revision 2928d1d9903a
../../ethdb/privateapi/all.go:10:2: github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20220920040819-2928d1d9903a: invalid version: unknown revision 2928d1d9903a
../../turbo/snapshotsync/block_reader.go:13:2: github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20220920040819-2928d1d9903a: invalid version: unknown revision 2928d1d9903a

../utils/flags.go:37:2: github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20220920040819-2928d1d9903a: invalid version: unknown revision 2928d1d9903a
../../eth/backend.go:47:2: github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20220920040819-2928d1d9903a: invalid version: unknown revision 2928d1d9903a
../../eth/stagedsync/stage_mining_create_block.go:18:2: github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20220920040819-2928d1d9903a: invalid version: unknown revision 2928d1d9903a
make: *** [Makefile:91: erigon.cmd] Error 1
host-1 ~/work/erigon2 (git::tags/v2022.09.03):
```

Face this issue also. 
Any updates/advice on this @AskAlexSharov ?
I appreciate your help :)

Git commit referred by hash. It doesn't need to be in any branch (no such requirement) - branch auto-removed after merge.
what is your go version? 
can't reproduce on go.1.19, but maybe go just can locate this commit on my local machine... i will push some update to `devel`

changed erigon-lib version by https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/pull/5576
but can't reproduce

> Git commit referred by hash. It doesn't need to be in any branch (no such requirement) - branch auto-removed after merge. what is your go version? can't reproduce on go.1.19, but maybe go just can locate this commit on my local machine... i will push some update to `devel`

AFAIK these lone commits cannot be cloned from GitHub. Also GH does some garbage collection and removes these orphan commits from time to time.

Anyway it worked now with the current erigon-lib with just small patch applied (see above)
A recent 2022.10.01 tag builds cleanly so I believe we should just close this ticket.
